entities.name: bagman

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is mentioned as an event that Mr. Bagman and Mr. Crouch have been working on.

relationships.description: Mr. Bagman and Mr. Crouch have worked tirelessly over the last few months on the arrangements for the Triwizard Tournament.
